thread.section_title: Evergreen.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Evergreen.ie | www.evergreen.ie
thread.title: Graham Dunne

author: Graham Dunne
title: Graham Dunne
text:
I'm glad to have found this site. I was looking for my favourite multivitamins for ages but could not find them. They are quite expensive so was also glad to find them at the going rate.
Having done that, Evergreen as a company offer fast service, free post on orders over thirty euro and a discount off my next order.
Pretty good for business, really.
